title: Uzaki-chan wa Asobitai! (Uzaki-chan Wants to Hang Out!)
synopsis: At the start of her freshman year in college, Hana Uzaki reunites with Shinichi Sakurai, an upperclassman who was in the same club as her during her high school days. However, much to her surprise, the once active senior has ended up becoming a "lonesome" student, preferring to spend his free time in quiet peace.
